page.title: 18Two games we play.
page.content: BULLDOG. Bulldog is a game which anyone can play.You need to be fast and dodgy.One person goes at the top of the field and the rest go down to the bottom.The person who is "on" shouts "BULLDOG" and they all run up the top and dodge past the person who is "on".If he/she dobs you,you are "on" with him/her.You keep doing this until all have been dobbed. WHAT'S THE TIME MR WOLF? At the start you pick a person to be the wolf.You have as many players as you want.The players say"WHAT'S THE TIME MR WOLF?" and the wolf says,1 o'clock,2 o'clock,3 o'clock and so on.When the wolf says dinner time the wolf chases the players and when the wolf catches you,you become the wolf.
